body:
Comment 7 by **olivier.antoine**: 
I use Gentoo/Linux i386 on hardened. I have similar behaviour :

# 8g echo.go && 8l echo.8 
# ./8.out 
Killed
# paxctl -v ./8.out 
PaX control v0.5
Copyright 2004,2005,2006,2007 PaX Team <pageexec@freemail.hu>

file ./8.out is not a valid ELF executable (PT_PHDR is outside of first PT_LOAD)


Go compiler doesn't seems to produce valid enought ELF files for PAX/GRSec and pax tools.

Don't know if it's related to this bug
